summary: this is just a bat file type in \"bat avb\" to activate can be used while making test characters and or if you just like to cheat your way through the game.
descriptionHtml:
the small description said it all
to activate
type
bat avb in your console and presto
this is to be used only if you want to use it on a test character or if you like to cheat your way through the game.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This is the new updated version of my recent bat file. this version now offers
Critical Chance set to 50. Shout recovery tweaked. combat health regen tweak .
poison resist tweaked to 100.  disease resist set to 100.  detect life range 500.  weapon speed tweaked. and leftweaponspeed tweaked.

again in the future i will be making much more complex mods. if you have any suggestions and or mod idea\'s we can work on together let me know i am a begginer but i learn fast.
author: EMAModder
